content:
When trying to use the NarrativeGenerator how it is described in the doc i get: 

Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: org.thymeleaf.templateresolver.ITemplateResolver
    at java.base/jdk.internal.loader.BuiltinClassLoader.loadClass(BuiltinClassLoader.java:583)
    at java.base/jdk.internal.loader.ClassLoaders$AppClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoaders.java:178)
    at java.base/java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:521)
Hi, I see that unfortunately no one answered this and was wondering if you ever found a resolution as I am currently experiencing this.
